document_data.name: Phiirornaera
document_data.mainbody: '''Phiirornaera''' of [[Yacla]] was a mage. She was petrified by the [[Magister]] [[Kurtal]] at some point prior to {{yearlink|886}} and remained in stone form by the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Phiirornaera was petrified by [[Kurtal]] at some point before {{yearlink|886}} and put in an embarassing position by his bath to serve as a towel-holder; even in stone form, she somehow co-opted the web of spells he used to query the heads of his rivals for knowledge and advice. She influenced him so into ever bolder actions.

About a century after his death, by {{yearlink|1000}}, a rockslide covered the cavern home of Kurtal; still petrified, Phiirornaera remained in there until at least the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
